name: Hit & Yum
description:
This is a student project that is currently in development. The goal of this project, for us, is not to have a complete game but instead to have a version of a game that demonstrates our talents and abilities.

Take on the role as a hired restaurant saboteur for a lowly vendor at the Flavour Town Mall. Each day presents a new opportunity to deal a blow to a rival. Sneak through busy kitchens and avoid being caught in order to wreak havoc. Sabotage opportunities are plentiful, including swapping orders, placing rat traps, over spicing, adding roaches to plates, stirring in laxatives and more. Each restaurant has unique sabotage opportunities to be on the look out for as well. Use the hard earned salary to purchase upgrades in the shop which will increase your ability. The best saboteurs will use the chefs habits against them, stay out of sight and ruin every possible dish. . . can you?
